item.description:

item.title: I'm curious about how the point rewards shift depending on popularity. Is that actually dynamic
item.description: I'm curious about how the point rewards shift depending on popularity. Is that actually dynamic? (As in an automatic response rather than a dev making the decision?) If so I'm impressed. Call it a "wisdom of crowds" thing but I've always thought the usage numbers of the various zones are a more accurate reading of their practical risk vs. reward levels than any ideas a dev might have about them.
